section.description: Alpha Anywhere provides an expanded definition of fill styles and color. You may apply these fills to controls and layouts.

step.description: Select an option from the Style list. Click to select a pattern from the drop-down picker.
If you selected "Solid" in step 1, Select a color from the Foreground color list.
If you selected a "Gradient Horizontal", "Gradient Vertical", "Gradient Radial", or "Pattern" style in step 1:

case.description: 1. Select a color from the Foreground color list.
2. Select a color from the Background color list.
